name: Number Alliance 7
description:
Game Description: An addictive digital synthesis game.

Game Features:Exquisite pictures and ease the elegant music melody.
Easy leisure, easy-to-use strategy game.
No time limit, simple operation and fun!

Playing Method: Players need to look for the same number in hexagon chess,let them merge add to 7.
But the board range of small and numbers are random,often the latter part of you will be able to play the next need to think about each step of the way.
Combining pop game,let you to promote digital of logical thinking can get better!
Just click on the download,together to experience the charm of digital!
